rukus.text: The sending down of the book, in which there is nothing doubtful, (is) from the Fosterer of the worlds
Or do they say, “He has forged it?” No, it is the truth from your Fosterer that you may warn a people to whom no warner has come before you, they that may receive guidance

It is Allah Who created the skies and the earth and that which is between them both, in six periods, then He set the balance on the throne (of the universe). You do not have besides Him any guardian nor do you have a mediator. Then, will you not be mindful
He governs the affair from the sky to the earth, then it will ascend to Him in a day, the measure of which is a thousand years of that which you count
That is the Knower of the unseen and the seen, the Mighty, the Merciful
Who made good everything which He created, and He began the creation of man from clay
then made His progeny from something (sperm and egg) taken out from the fluid (which is) weakened after vigour
then He set him in equilibrium and breathed into him from His spirit and made for you the (sources of) hearing and seeing and the hearts, little is the gratitude you show
And they say, “What! when we are lost in the earth, will we then be in a new creation?” No, they do not believe in (their) meeting with their Fosterer
Say, “The angel of death, who is entrusted with you, will take you back (cause you to die), then to your Fosterer you will be returned.”
